page.title: 11Farming (1)
page.content:
There are nine farms in the Bickmarsh, Cleeve Prior, Littleton and Ullington area,{Bickmarsh Lodge, Green Hill {Farm,Hoden Farm, Honeybrook {Farm,Kingsmoor Farm, Norval Farm, {Pebworth Road Farm, Ullington Hall {Farm and Woodlands Farm.}Some of the land farmed belongs to the council.
{Woodlands Farm,}which is situated in North Littleton has seventy sheep, seventy ewes, one hundred lambs, fifty two cattle, one horse, eight hens, four ducks, five bantams and a goat (called Pixie). The farmer has ten acres of trees incorporating five acres of plums. The pear and apples trees being over eighty years old. The produce is sold at Evesham's Smithfield Market and the livestock is auctioned at Gloucester Market.
